snippet: The footage, if confirmed, would be the first evidence that the Islamic State’s leaders in Syria and Iraq are coordinating with fighters who have taken up the group’s banner in southern and eastern Libya.
abstract: Islamic State releases video that appears to show execution of dozens of Ethiopian Christians by fighters from group's branches in southern and eastern Libya; executions are prefaced by speeches and interviews that appear to have been filmed from group's locations in Syria and Iraq, which suggests that group's leaders are directly working with fighters in Libya.

byline.contributor: Merna Thomas contributed reporting from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: The footage, if confirmed, would be the first evidence that the Islamic State’s leaders in Syria and Iraq are coordinating with fighters who have taken up the group’s banner in southern and eastern Libya.

headline.main: ISIS Video Appears to Show Executions of Ethiopian Christians in Libya
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Video Appears to Show Executions of Christians in Libya

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
